title: 'PROS AND CONS ||'
body: The biggest con is that for one month of using it will smell of plastic unless you are one of those people who immediately wash it. The smell took 20-25 nights of using and spraying with perfume to go away. It does not look great also mind you.  The pros -> this is so ultimately comfortable, I was not getting proper sleep for many days and realised I was cold at night so I changed my 1 layer solimo mattress with a double layer. Not only is it double layer but it's also longer which is ideal for me.  It has been a month and I can't live without this.  + Sleep Improves + Comfortable + Great for all seasons  Negative - Smells bad for a month unless you wash it
